Item.Line: (A grumpy middle aged man with a wig is sitting behind a desk furiously scribbling something on paper.)
Hi, I assume you are Mr. Beethoven?
(And then you remember, Beethoven is almost deaf. You passed him a note explaining why you are here.)

Play my Symphony No. 5. I can "hear" the music in my mind just by watching you conduct. And I should also warn you my symphonies are much more serious than the ones by Mozart. I shall grant you my recognition if you can score higher than 900.
